title: Compare historical perspective Goya and West

content.question: These two paintings take different approaches to contemporary political events. Identify the artist of the painting on the right. How does each work reflect a particular political point of view?

frqParts.text: These two paintings take different approaches to contemporary political events. Identify the artist of the painting on the right. How does each work reflect a particular political point of view?

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
